post.body: G'night!
I taught music at University HS in Irvine, CA.... long time ago. Last 28+ years.. elem. in Friday Harbor, WA
Just noticed your bio. I was performing arts chair... loved accompanying the drama kids to state competitions.
Hi Judi, thanks for the DM back. Tried to DM you, but was blocked there. Hope you're having a great day.
Excellent. I'm playing a local restaurant this Sunday. Again 1st in 4 years. Used to do weddings and restaurants.
What do you play?
It went well. Some minor problems at first, but calmed down. It was 1st perf. in years. Developed tremor few years back....
You're talking real winter weather.... not the light weight weather we're having. =)
I'm new enough that I didn't know there was a difference... but I'm still at it. =)
Didn't get to do any shopping. Roads were too bad. Just went and played the gig.
Classical guitar.
Andre Segovia... long ago and far away. =)
YEA!!!
hmmm... It's http://www.homerjsmith.com I'll have to check out the problem. Thanks for letting me know.
Yea Twittering... Tweeting... ?? Oh, it's just fun.
Friend tried that in a Buck's territory. Got charged. He should have had a bigger gun! =)
GO WALK NOW!!! Tweet us later. LOL
Hear, Hear!
Nice blog/website. Did you design it?
Hello, good to hear from you. :-)
I used to play a lot, then developed a benign tremor, so it's taken a while + meds to get back to try again. Lovin' it. :-)
It was. I graduated from High School and went through undergrad and grad school there. It was great then!
Yes, so far so good here. I think you have made a good decision.
THank you, Her name is Barbara. Wife is on phone now. EMT's are there, They're heading for hospital.
Her name is Barbara. Wife is on phone now. EMT's are there, They're heading for hospital.
It's not quite that bad yet up here in NW WA.
Electrical work finished on garage. Had 2 power outages due to high winds. Have the house set up to run on a generator now.
Morning Fellow Twitter Road Travelers. More light snow and 24 deg. in Ocean Shores, WA.
I'm gone for the day. Shopping and then playing for a new store's special evening. Scary... hopefully fun.
Good Morning Tweeters. Yesterday's Ocean Shores weather was typical... Sunny, Cloudy, Overcast, Rain, and Snow. Yes all in 1 day. :-)
We finally had our own Christmas time this a.m. With BIL surgery, hospital trips, etc. We decided to wait. Very quiet this a.m... Nice :-)
Good Night from Ocean Shores, WA
Getting ready to finally have family Christmas celebration. Lots of the 3 F's....food, football, and family. :-)
Wishing you all a HAPPY NEW YEAR, with many Blessings.
Played a restaurant gig Sunday. First time playing in public for about 4 years. Scary..went well. yea. Playing there again this Sunday p.m.
Good Morning Twitter World. It's a lovely, overcast day in Ocean Shore, WA. At least there is no wind, rain, or snow. :-)
Home Late. All day at hospital. BIL and SIL both doing fine. Car was towed, but no people injuries. Thank you for prayers. :-)
Sister-in-law had car accident on way to hospital. BIL in hospital. We're heading there now. Prayers are appreciated.
Amazing concern from Tweeters. We really appreciate all the prayers and special thoughts. Will keep you all posted. Thank You. :-)
Wife is on phone with her sister now. She called 911, EMT's are there, They're heading for hospital. We'll head out when called.
